title: An Act relative to fraternal organizations conducting bazaars

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Ayers of Quincy, a petition (subject to Joint Rule 12) of Bruce J. Ayers relative to fraternal organizations conducting bazaars.  Economic Development and Emerging Technologies.
